name: Fall Limited Edition Sneakers
description: These low-profile sneakers are your perfect casual wear companion. Featuring a durable rubber outer sole, they’ll withstand everything the weather can offer.

name: The Vibrant Legacy Edition
description: It represents a bold blend of vibrant teal and crisp white, offering both style and comfort in every step. Designed for those who dare to stand out, it balances sleek sophistication with a dynamic color pop.

name: The Urban Classic Edition
description: It blends the iconic Converse design with a fresh, effortless vibe. Perfect for those who value timeless style and comfortable, everyday wear, it’s a step forward in classic footwear.

name: Sunflare Limited Edition
description: It  features an ultra-lightweight mesh upper for maximum breathability and reduced fatigue during long runs. Its responsive midsole and cushioned heel absorb impact, delivering smooth transitions with every stride. Reinforced arch support and slip-resistant outsoles ensure stability on both urban roads and track surfaces.

name: Amber Brown Edition
description: Minimalist design crafted from premium brown leather. Its clean silhouette and neutral tones make them versatile for any casual or smart-casual outfit. Set on a comfortable sole, they balance modern style with everyday wearability.

name: Urban White Kicks
description: It features a clean white base accented with soft pastel pink and sky blue. Its minimalist design blends sporty and casual elements, perfect for everyday wear. Lightweight and versatile, it brings a fresh, playful vibe to any outfit.

name: Sport Skywave Runner
description: Lightweight and breathable design for all-day comfort. Soft sky-blue tones paired with sleek gray accents for a modern look. Perfect balance of style and performance, ideal for casual or sporty wear.
